Package org.ldaptive

Class LdapUtils

java.lang.Object
org.ldaptive.LdapUtils
public final class LdapUtils extends Object
Provides utility methods for this package.

    • shouldBase64Encode

      public static boolean shouldBase64Encode(byte[] value, boolean strict)
      Determines whether the supplied value should be base64 encoded. See http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc2849.html for more details. A false strict flag will return true if the string contains a character outside of [0x20, 0x7F) that should not be encoded as defined by RFC 2849
      Parameters:
      value - to inspect
      strict - whether to strictly enforce what RFC 2849 requires
      Returns:
      whether the value should be base64 encoded

      Returns:

    • computeHashCode

      private static int computeHashCode(Object object)

      object - to calculate hash code for
      Returns:
      hash code
